title: I'm sick of smurfs who intentionally ruin bronze games
body:
Why do people do that? (That's a rhetorical question. We all know they do that because they're compensating for something.)

But seriously, fuck those smurfs. You're ruining games for 9 people. Even your own team will be fucking frustrated because you're just making the game a 1v5 and they dont get a chance to do anything. If you were a high school basketball player, you might want to play 1 or 2 learning games with Michael Jordan, but it's not gonna be fun playing with Michael Jordan in a competition game (like ranked) where it's 1 person doing everything and you're pretty much benched.

Smurfs are pretty much benching 4 other players on the team and thats why nobody likes it. Not the enemies of course because they get stomped. But not the smurfs team themselves.

**DO NOT SUPPORT STREAMERS WHO POST VIDEOS OF THEMSELVES SMURFING AND PUBSTOMPING LOWER ELO, THEY ARE RUINING THE GAME FOR 9 PEOPLE EVERY TIME THEY DO THAT AND PROBABLY BREAKING THE SUMMONERS CODE TOO**
